name: God's Pantry Emergency Food Box Program
description: God's Pantry Emergency Food Box Program provides emergency food assistance to individuals and families in need across Central and Eastern Kentucky. This program is operated by God's Pantry Food Bank and serves as a vital resource for those experiencing food insecurity. When you call, you provide your county of residence and they will direct you to the appropriate food distribution location nearest to you. The program helps supplement diets of people with low income by providing emergency food boxes.
source: Verified from multiple official sources including Kentucky.gov, God's Pantry Food Bank website, and various county resource guides
notes: This is a centralized emergency food assistance program. Callers provide their county of residence and are directed to the nearest food distribution location. The program serves Central and Eastern Kentucky counties. God's Pantry Food Bank is the parent organization that operates this emergency food box program. Main office located in Lexington, KY.
